architectural_elements.name: Grand Staircase
architectural_elements.description: A sweeping double staircase with carved banisters and worn carpet runners, creaking under every step.

architectural_elements.name: Wooden Floorboards
architectural_elements.description: Aged planks with deep scratches and stains, echoing footsteps across the corridor.

architectural_elements.name: Tall Doorways
architectural_elements.description: Heavy wooden doors with ornate handles and peeling paint, some slightly ajar.

architectural_elements.name: Wall Paneling
architectural_elements.description: Dark wooden panels and faded wallpaper, peeling at the edges and stained with age.

architectural_elements.name: Ceiling Molding
architectural_elements.description: Decorative plaster moldings cracked with time, dust falling gently when disturbed.

furniture_and_decor.name: Portrait Paintings
furniture_and_decor.description: Large framed paintings of family ancestors whose eyes seem to follow the player’s movement.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wall Mirrors
furniture_and_decor.description: Tall, gilded mirrors along the hallway, some cracked or reflecting figures that aren’t really there.

furniture_and_decor.name: Side Tables
furniture_and_decor.description: Small wooden tables holding vases, candleholders, or decaying flowers.

furniture_and_decor.name: Rugs and Runners
furniture_and_decor.description: Long, faded carpets lining the hallways, threadbare and slightly damp.

furniture_and_decor.name: Chandeliers
furniture_and_decor.description: Elegant yet dusty chandeliers hanging from the ceiling, crystals swaying as if moved by unseen air.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Delicate webs hanging in corners, glimmering faintly in dim light.

atmospheric_details.name: Drafts of Cold Air
atmospheric_details.description: Sudden gusts flowing through the halls, carrying faint whispers or sighs.

atmospheric_details.name: Echoing Footsteps
atmospheric_details.description: Sounds of movement that do not match the player’s steps, coming from distant halls.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Lights
atmospheric_details.description: Wall lamps and chandeliers that flicker sporadically, plunging sections into darkness.

atmospheric_details.name: Dust in the Air
atmospheric_details.description: Fine dust drifting in beams of light, disturbed by unseen movement.

interactive_objects.name: Locked Door
interactive_objects.description: A door with an ornate handle that rattles but won’t open, requiring a key or trigger to unlock.

interactive_objects.name: Hidden Passage Switch
interactive_objects.description: A wall sconce or book that can be pulled to reveal a hidden stairway or secret door.

interactive_objects.name: Fallen Portrait
interactive_objects.description: A painting lying face down on the floor, revealing something hidden behind it.

interactive_objects.name: Candleholder
interactive_objects.description: A movable sconce that acts as a lever or light source, with wax dripping onto the wall below.

interactive_objects.name: Crumpled Letter
interactive_objects.description: A torn note or message found on a table or floor, hinting at the mansion’s secrets.

environmental_effects.name: Creaking Sounds
environmental_effects.description: Boards, banisters, and doors making unsettling creaks in the silence.

environmental_effects.name: Phantom Shadows
environmental_effects.description: Dark silhouettes moving along the walls, vanishing when approached.

environmental_effects.name: Distant Laughter or Crying
environmental_effects.description: Faint echoes of human voices coming from upstairs or around corners.

environmental_effects.name: Swinging Chandelier
environmental_effects.description: A chandelier that sways gently, chains rattling though no wind is present.

environmental_effects.name: Sudden Temperature Drops
environmental_effects.description: Cold patches of air that cause visible breath and shivers as the player passes through.

lighting.name: Wall Sconces
lighting.description: Iron sconces holding flickering candles that cast shifting light along the corridor walls.

lighting.name: Chandelier Glow
lighting.description: Dim, golden light from dusty chandeliers reflecting off mirrors and portraits.

lighting.name: Moonlight Through Windows
lighting.description: Pale light streaming through high arched windows, cutting across the staircase.

lighting.name: Lantern Light
lighting.description: A handheld or dropped lantern providing a moving pool of light across the hallway floor.
